DOC.brief_summary: Perampanel non-competitive antagonist AMPA ( 2-amino-3- ( 5-méthyl-3-hydroxy-1,2-oxazol-4-yl ) ) propanoïc acid receptor approve European Medicines Agency adjunctive treatment partial-onset seizure patient 12 year old , 2012 . The aim study evaluate effectiveness safety perampanel add-on treatment patient refractory epilepsy . The investigator retrospectively collect analyzed data patient refractory epilepsy treat perampanel May 2014 April 2015 . In total , one hundred ten patient include ( mean age 41 [ SD = 15.2 ] ) . The mean duration epilepsy 25 year ( SD = 14.4 ) . The mean perampanel dose 5.7 mg/d ( SD = 2.3 ) . The retention rate 77 % 6 month 61 % 12 month . After 6 month , responder rate 35.5 % . Eight patient ( 7.3 % ) become seizure free . Adverse effect report 60 patient ( 54.5 % ) . Most common side effect behaviour disturbance ( 22.7 % ) , dizziness ( 15.5 % ) , asthenia ( 11.8 ) , somnolence ( 10 % ) ataxia ( 9.1 ) .
